articles.author: Sophia Cai
articles.title: Trump on return trip to Washington predicts demise of Cuba, warns Colombia, threatens Greenland - Politico
articles.description: The comments came less than 48 hours after the American military conducted a brazen raid inside Caracas to arrest Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
articles.content:
Cuba looks like its ready to fall, Trump said. I dont know if theyre going to hold out.
The president waved off the possibility that the administration might use American forces to hasten the Cuban … [+1825 chars]
